cleaned_text: Retirement and Savings Programs One of the most important benefits of working at UCI Health is the opportunity to save toward your retirement. The decisions you make now will have a long-term impact. The resources below are designed to educate and help you make informed choices. Resources [My UC Retirement ](https://myucretirement.com/choose) [UC Retirement Choice Program ](http://ucnet.universityofcalifornia.edu/compensation-and-benefits/retirement-benefits/2016-retirement-choice/index.html) [How to start a voluntary retirement contribution ](http://ucnet.universityofcalifornia.edu/compensation-and-benefits/retirement-benefits/ucrs/index.html) [How to find your online annual retirement review ](https://www.myucretirement.com/Resource/215) [ How to prepare for retirement ](http://ucnet.universityofcalifornia.edu/compensation-and-benefits/roadmaps/retiring.html) [How to start the retirement process ](http://ucnet.universityofcalifornia.edu/compensation-and-benefits/roadmaps/retiring.html) [How to retirement celebration ](/-/media/files/pdf/human-resources/retirementcelebrationguidelinessept2012.pdf) [Fidelity (on-site education, webinars, one-on-one) ](https://www.myucretirement.com/Resource/156) Workshops Ready, Set, Retire This workshop is designed for employees six months to one year from retirement. The workshop is a chance to learn valuable information and resources about retirement so you can make an informed decision about your future. Learn about UC Retirement Plan (UCRP) benefits and options, health insurance benefits in retirement and what happens after you retire. To find an upcoming workshop, [log in to UC Learning Center and search "Ready, Set, Retire" ](http://uclc.uci.edu) Fidelity Fidelity Retirement Services offers various workshops both in person and online to help you in meeting your financial goals. Topics include designing a financial roadmap, understanding the power of debt, building a portfolio for any weather and more. Complementary one-on-one appointments are also offered in person and by phone to help answer your questions, including: - Does my portfolio have the right mix of investments? - Am I saving enough to retire when and how I want? - Will I have enough money to last throughout my retirement?
